title: The holie Bible faithfully translated into English, out of the authentical Latin. Diligently conferred with the Hebrew, Greeke, and other editions in diuers languages. With arguments of the bookes, and chapters: annotations. tables: and other helpes ... By the English College of Doway
author: Martin, Gregory, d. 1582.
publisher: By Laurence Kellam, at the signe of the holie Lambe,
notes: The Douai version, translated largely by Gregory Martin.
Old Testament and Apocrypha only; the New Testament had appeared at Rheims in 1582.
With errata slip to vol. 1, and a final errata leaf in vol. 2.
The last leaf in vol. 2 is blank.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
